############################################################
# Demigods - names for minions
#
# Format: [God] minion name {suffix}
#   - {suffix} can be low|mid|high to describe minions of
#     increasing difficulty but this is optional and unused
#     until we have a big enough name selection to warrant
#     dividing names up into more/less impressive sounding
#     lists.
#
# "generic minion name" is temporary while names are not
# written for all gods.
#
# @Minion_name@ will be substituted (for now) for a random
# name generated by Crawl's random name algorithm.
############################################################
%%%%
generic minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Bold|Strong|Mighty|Brave|Adventurous|Generic]
%%%%
Zin minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Unclean|Unworthy|Unsullied|Incorruptible]
%%%%
The Shining One minion name

@Zin minion name@
%%%%
Elyvilon minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Kindly|Soft|Healthy|Hearty|Hale]

@Minion_name@ the [Splicer|Physician|Dicer|Surgeon|Cutter]
%%%%
Fedhas minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Gardener|Planter|Soiler|Tiller|Ploughman|Composter]

@Minion_name@ [Green|Tree|Grass][bean|beard|finger|thumb|bark|leaf]

w:2
@Minion_name@ the [Figg|Twigg|Moss][y|ish|er]
%%%%
Ashenzari minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Cursed|Bound|All-seeing|All-knowing|Insightful|Explorer]
%%%%
Cheibriados minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Slow|Ponderous|Lazy|Tardy|Sleeper|Dreamer|Imaginer]
%%%%
Trog minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Angry|Monstrous|Unappeasable|Eviscerator|Loud|Destroyer|Burning|Unstable]

@Minion_name@ [Blood|Skull|Bone|Heart|Tooth|Gut|Toe][crusher|masher|smasher|fist|ripper|strangler|-eater|gut|cutter|mangler|grabber]
%%%%
Sif Muna minion name

The [Wizard|Witch|Sorceror|Mage|Alchemist] @Minion_name@

@Minion_name@ the [Irridescent|Sage|Enlightened|Arcane|Magical|Effervescent]
%%%%
Xom minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Colourful|Psychedelic|Fun|Toy|Playful|Laughing|Teddy Bear|Glowing|Incomprehensible|Unintelligible|Blouse|Fruitcake|Hatter]
%%%%
Okawaru minion name

%%%%
Vehumet minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Destructor|Explosive|Combustible|Inflammable]
%%%%
Yredelemnul minion name

@Minion_name@ the [Terror|Terrible|Evil|Deathly|Unliving|Everliving]

@Minion_name@ [Storm|Death|Fear|Night|Dark][bringer|cloud|monger]

@Minion_name@ [Bone|Soul|Mind][shaker|rattler|stealer|grinder]
%%%%
